parameters.name: algorithmArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the algorithm to describe.

nested_items.name: algorithm
nested_items.description: A listing of the properties of the algorithm.

nested_items.description: The name of the algorithm.

nested_items.name: algorithmArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the algorithm.

nested_items.name: algorithmImage
nested_items.description: The URI of the Docker container for the algorithm image.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the algorithm image.

nested_items.name: dockerURI
nested_items.description: The URI of the Docker container for the algorithm image.

nested_items.name: defaultHyperParameters
nested_items.description: Specifies the default hyperparameters.

nested_items.name: defaultHyperParameterRanges
nested_items.description: Specifies the default hyperparameters, their ranges, and whether they are tunable. A tunable hyperparameter can have its value determined during hyperparameter optimization (HPO).

nested_items.name: integerHyperParameterRanges
nested_items.description: The integer-valued hyperparameters and their default ranges.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: minValue
nested_items.description: The minimum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: maxValue
nested_items.description: The maximum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: isTunable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the hyperparameter is tunable.

nested_items.name: continuousHyperParameterRanges
nested_items.description: The continuous hyperparameters and their default ranges.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: minValue
nested_items.description: The minimum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: maxValue
nested_items.description: The maximum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: isTunable
nested_items.description: Whether the hyperparameter is tunable.

nested_items.name: categoricalHyperParameterRanges
nested_items.description: The categorical hyperparameters and their default ranges.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: A list of the categories for the hyperparameter.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: isTunable
nested_items.description: Whether the hyperparameter is tunable.

nested_items.name: defaultResourceConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies the default maximum number of training jobs and parallel training jobs.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: trainingInputMode
nested_items.description: The training input mode.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the algorithm was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the algorithm was last updated.
